title: Justice League Beyond 1-25 (2012-2013) (Complete)
description:
English | CBR | 25 Issues

Justice League Beyond #1-25
Publisher:  DC Comics
Publication Date:  February 1, 2012 - June 29, 2013

Writers:  Derek Fridolfs and Dustin Nguyen (#1-17, 21-25); Derek Fridolfs (#18-20)
Penciler:  Dustin Nguyen (#1-6, 11-15, 21), Eric Nguyen (#7-9), James Brouwer (#10), Ben Caldwell (#16, 22-24), Fiona Staples (#17), Jorge Corona (#18-20), and Marcus To (#25)
Inker:  Derek Fridolfs (#1-6, 11-15, 18-24), Eric Nguyen (#7-9), James Brouwer (#10), Ben Caldwell (#16), Fiona Staples (#17), and Marcus To (#25)
Colorist:  Randy Mayor (#1-18, 22-24), Nick Filardi (#19-20), John Kalisz (#21), and Ian Herring (#25)
Letterer:  Saida Temofonte
Cover:  Dustin Nguyen (#1-17, 21); Khary Randolph and Emilio Lopez (#18-20, 22-25)

A new era in adventure begins as Batman Beyond joins the vaunted Justice League--just in time for their biggest adventure ever! Dustin Nguyen and Derek Fridolfs deliver an unprecedented series full of epic exploits.  These digital first issues were collected into the monthly print comic Batman Beyond Unlimited.

Thanks goes to TheGroup, ZOOM, Zone, K6, Son of Ultron, and DCP for this release.
